query.stmt: <#if upOrDown??&&upOrDown=='UP'> SELECT DISTINCT id,name,'false' as checked from( SELECT U.ID,U.NAME, 'false' AS CHECKED,ROWNUM RN FROM SYS_P_USER U,SYS_P_USER_UG UG WHERE U.ID = UG.USER_ID AND UG.USER_GROUP_CODE [in(group_codes)] AND U.status_id = 1 AND U.DEPT_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM SYS_P_DEPARTMENT O START WITH O.ID = (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM SYS_P_USER WHERE ID = ${_CurrUser.id}) CONNECT BY PRIOR PARENT_ID = ID ) <#if q??> AND U.NAME [like(q)] </#if> ORDER BY NAME ASC ) WHERE RN<15 AND ID <> ${_CurrUser.id} </#if> <#if upOrDown??&&upOrDown=='DOWN'> SELECT DISTINCT id,name,'false' as checked from( SELECT U.ID,U.NAME, 'false' AS CHECKED,ROWNUM RN FROM SYS_P_USER U,SYS_P_USER_UG UG WHERE U.ID = UG.USER_ID AND UG.USER_GROUP_CODE [in(group_codes)] AND U.status_id = 1 AND U.DEPT_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM SYS_P_DEPARTMENT O START WITH O.ID = (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM SYS_P_USER WHERE ID = ${_CurrUser.id}) CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = PARENT_ID ) <#if q??> AND U.NAME [like(q)] </#if> ORDER BY NAME ASC ) WHERE RN<15 AND ID <> ${_CurrUser.id} </#if> <#if upOrDown??&&upOrDown=='HISTORY'&&taskId??> SELECT DISTINCT id,name,'false' as checked from( SELECT U.ID ,U.NAME,'false' as checked ,ROWNUM RN FROM SYS_P_USER U,WF_RU_TASK T,WF_FLOW F WHERE U.ID = T.HANDLE_MAN_ID AND U.status_id = 1 AND T.NODE_ID = F.END_NODE_ID AND F.ID = [flowId] AND T.WORK_ORDER_ID = (SELECT WORK_ORDER_ID FROM WF_RU_TASK WHERE ID = [taskId]) <#if q??> AND U.NAME [like(q)] </#if> ORDER BY NAME ASC ) WHERE RN<15 AND ID <> ${_CurrUser.id} </#if>

processor.name: set-value
processor.param: SELECT N.GROUP_CODES FROM WF_FLOW F , WF_NODE N WHERE F.END_NODE_ID = N.ID AND F.ID = [flowId]

processor.name: set-value
processor.param: SELECT F.UP_OR_DOWN FROM WF_FLOW F WHERE F.ID = [flowId]
